text: Gwilym Lee (born 24 November 1983) is a British actor. He is best known for his roles in Jamestown, Midsomer Murders, Top End Wedding, A Song for Jenny, The Great, and for playing guitarist Brian May in the biopic Bohemian Rhapsody.Bohemian Rhapsody's Gwilym Lee Joins Hulu Pilot 'The Great', Retrieved May 13, 2023. ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English voice actors Category:English stage actors Category:Actors from Bristol
title: Gwilym Lee
